Package com.atgenomix.seqslab.piper.plugin.api.loader

package com.atgenomix.seqslab.piper.plugin.api.loader

  • Class
    Description
    DataSource
    The main interface responsible for representing an accessible data source in SeqsLab.
    Loader
    An operator object responsible for loading (reading) an in-memory DataFrame or copying to local host file system from a specific data source, e.g.
    LoaderSupport
    Factory object responsible for creating Loader operators.
    SupportsCopyToLocal
    The loader operator implementing this feature supports copying storage files or directories directly to local file system.
    SupportsHadoopDFS
    The loader operator implementing this feature indicates it supports reading or copying files and directories from storages compatible with Hadoop Distributed File System.
    SupportsPartitioning
    The loader operator implementing this feature indicates it is partition-aware that workflow engine shall assure the same data partition across multiple input data sources must be in the same Spark executor in localization process.
    SupportsReadingDataFrame
    The loader operator implementing this feature indicates it supports loading input files and returns Spark DataFrame.
    SupportsReadingDeltaTable
    The loader operator implementing this feature indicates it supports loading delta table and returns Spark DataFrame.
